::: {style="background-color: #e8f4f8; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 30px; border-left: 4px solid #3498db;"}
## Data Collection & Validation Workshop for MSP

**Focus:** Building capacity in data collection protocols, quality assurance, and validation techniques for Marine Spatial Planning initiatives in coastal Tanzania.
:::

## Workshop Overview

**Date & Time:** To be announced  
**Location:** SOAF-UDSM, Dar es Salaam  
**Duration:** 3 days  
**Target Participants:** Government officials, NGO staff, academic researchers, community representatives

### Workshop Objectives

- Establish standardized data collection protocols for MSP
- Train participants in data quality assurance and validation methods
- Build local capacity for sustainable data management
- Ensure data consistency across coastal districts (Mkoani, Mkuranga)
- Develop community engagement strategies for data validation

### Topics Covered

- MSP Data Framework & Requirements
- Data Collection Best Practices
- Quality Assurance & Validation Protocols
- Spatial Data Management
- Community Participation in Data Validation
- Data Documentation & Metadata Standards

```{=html}
<script>
// Supabase Configuration - Load from shared JSON file
let SUPABASE_CONFIG = {
  SUPABASE_URL: '',
  SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: '',
  TABLE_NAME: 'msp_registrations'
};

let supabaseClient = null;

// Load credentials from sessionStorage (set by admin-setup page)
async function loadCredentialsFromFile() {
  try {
    const url = sessionStorage.getItem('supabase_url');
    const key = sessionStorage.getItem('supabase_key');
    
    if (url && key) {
      SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_URL = url;
      SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY = key;
      console.log('✓ Loaded Supabase credentials from browser session');
      await initSupabase();
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.warn('No Supabase configuration found in browser');
  }
}

async function initSupabase() {
  if (!SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_URL || !SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY) {
    console.log('Supabase not configured');
    return null;
  }
  
  try {
    // Load Supabase JS library
    if (!window.supabase) {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@supabase/supabase-js@2';
      await new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        script.onload = resolve;
        script.onerror = reject;
        document.head.appendChild(script);
      });
    }
    
    const { createClient } = window.supabase;
    supabaseClient = createClient(SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_CONFIG.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY);
    console.log('✓ Supabase client ready');
    return supabaseClient;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('❌ Error initializing Supabase:', error);
    return null;
  }
}

async function saveRegistrationToSupabase(registrationData) {
  try {
    if (!supabaseClient) {
      console.error('Supabase client not initialized');
      return false;
    }
    
    const { data, error } = await supabaseClient
      .from(SUPABASE_CONFIG.TABLE_NAME)
      .insert([{
        name: registrationData.name,
        email: registrationData.email,
        phone: registrationData.phone,
        organization: registrationData.organization,
        role: registrationData.role,
        gender: registrationData.gender,
        origin: registrationData.origin,
        experience: registrationData.experience,
        interests: registrationData.interests,
        timestamp: registrationData.timestamp
      }]);
    
    if (error) {
      console.error('❌ Supabase error:', error.message);
      return false;
    }
    
    console.log('✓ Registration saved to Supabase');
    return true;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('❌ Error saving registration:', error);
    return false;
  }
}

// Load credentials on page load
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  await loadCredentialsFromFile();
});

// Form submission handler
document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').addEventListener('submit', async function(e) {
  e.preventDefault();
  
  const fullName = document.getElementById('fullName').value.trim();
  const email = document.getElementById('email').value.trim();
  const phone = document.getElementById('phone').value.trim() || 'Not provided';
  const organization = document.getElementById('organization').value.trim();
  const role = document.getElementById('role').value.trim();
  const gender = document.getElementById('gender').value;
  const origin = document.getElementById('origin').value.trim();
  const experience = document.getElementById('experience').value;
  const interests = document.getElementById('interests').value;
  
  // Validate required fields
  if (!fullName || !email || !organization || !role || !gender || !origin || !experience || !interests) {
    alert('Please fill in all required fields (marked with *)');
    return;
  }
  
  // Create registration object
  const newRegistration = {
    name: fullName,
    email: email,
    phone: phone,
    organization: organization,
    role: role,
    gender: gender,
    origin: origin,
    experience: experience,
    interests: interests,
    timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString()
  };
  
  // Disable button to prevent double submission
  const submitBtn = document.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
  const originalText = submitBtn.textContent;
  submitBtn.disabled = true;
  submitBtn.textContent = '⏳ Submitting...';
  
  // Save to Supabase
  const success = await saveRegistrationToSupabase(newRegistration);
  
  if (success) {
    // Show success message
    document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'block';
    
    // Reset form
    document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').reset();
    
    // Scroll to success message
    document.getElementById('successMessage').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
    
    // Hide message after 5 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
      document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'none';
    }, 5000);
  } else {
    alert('Error saving registration. Please try again.');
  }
  
  // Re-enable button
  submitBtn.disabled = false;
  submitBtn.textContent = originalText;
});
</script>
```

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Who should attend this workshop?**  
A: Government officials working on MSP, NGO representatives, researchers, community leaders, and anyone involved in data collection or validation for coastal management initiatives.

**Q: Do I need prior experience in data management?**  
A: No prior experience is required. We accommodate all experience levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners.

**Q: What is the cost of participation?**  
A: Pricing and fee information will be provided upon confirmation. Some support may be available for government staff and community representatives.

**Q: Will training materials be provided?**  
A: Yes, comprehensive training materials, data collection templates, and validation checklists will be provided to all participants.

**Q: How will this workshop help my organization?**  
A: This workshop will strengthen your organization's data management capacity, ensure consistency with national MSP standards, and improve the quality of spatial data for decision-making.

**Q: Will there be follow-up support after the workshop?**  
A: Yes, we provide ongoing technical support and can conduct on-site training at your organization if needed.
